nodes.text: Lyn Me was a Twi'lek female dancer who performed with the Max Rebo Band at Jabba the Hutt's Palace, and sang vocals along with Greeata Jendowanian, Sy Snootles and Rystáll Sant.
Me grew up on the barren northern continent of the planet Ryloth. She was saved from slavery by Boba Fett and thus hero-worshiped him. She was well-learned in the art of Twi'lek dance.
Lyn Me was portrayed by Dalyn Chew. She was added to the extended musical number in the Special Edition of Return of the Jedi.
